Created attachment 23241
Crash core dump

FreeBDS 7.0 with PAE

Time to time apache child die and no restarting again. For next request new child has started. When it reached ServerLimit Apache totaly chrashes with no responce and only manual restert can help.

Some time when child pid crashes apache generate core. It in attachment.
